evoter.server.http.request

Class SubjectService

  • java.lang.Object
    • evoter.server.http.request.SubjectService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISubjectService

    @Service
@Transactional
@TransactionConfiguration(defaultRollback=true)
public class SubjectService
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISubjectService
    Process all Subject requests sent by client applications
    This class is an implementation of ISubjectService
    Author:
    btdiem

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object doCreate(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
      Create new Subject from the input parameter
      Insert a new Subject to subject table
      Iterate user email list and insert these records to user_subject table
      This method is called when receiving URIRequest.CREATE_SUBJECT
      java.lang.Object doDelete(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
      Delete given subject from database and its reference
      java.lang.Object doEdit(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
      Update a the changes for Subject to database
      Delete all records of this subject in user_subject table
      Iterate email list, create UserSubject and insert new records to user_subject table
      This method is called when receiving URIRequest.UPDATE_SUBJECT
      java.lang.Object doGetAll(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
      If user type is UserType.SECRETARY, select all Subject created by all teacher users
      Otherwise, select only subjects requested by User
      java.lang.Object doGetUsersOfSubject(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
      Select all users of Subject
      java.lang.Object doSearch(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
      Select a List of Subject matching conditions of parameter request
      java.lang.Object doView(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
      Select Subject by subjectID of parameter request

      • doView

        public java.lang.Object doView(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
        Description copied from interface: ISubjectService
        Select Subject by subjectID of parameter request
        Specified by:
        doView in interface ISubjectService
        Parameters:
        parameters - contains :
        • SubjectDAO.ID
        UserDAO.USER_KEY
        Returns:
        Subject.toJSON() if subjectID can be found. Otherwise,
        return "subject does not exist" message

      • doGetAll

        @Rollback(value=false)
public java.lang.Object doGetAll(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
        Description copied from interface: ISubjectService
        If user type is UserType.SECRETARY, select all Subject created by all teacher users
        Otherwise, select only subjects requested by User
        Specified by:
        doGetAll in interface ISubjectService
        Parameters:
        parameters - contains :
        • UserDAO.USER_KEY
        Returns:
        User.toJSON() array if subject list can be found.
        Otherwise, returning an empty array

      • doDelete

        public java.lang.Object doDelete(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
        Description copied from interface: ISubjectService
        Delete given subject from database and its reference
        Specified by:
        doDelete in interface ISubjectService
        Parameters:
        parameters - contains
        • SubjectDAO.ID
        UserDAO.USER_KEY
        Returns:
        success message if there is no exception.
        Otherwise, returning failure message
        When delete a subject:
        delete subject in SUBJECT table
        delete subjects in USER_SUBJECT table
        delete all sessions of this subject in SESSION table
        delete all sessions of this subject in SESSION_USER table
        delete all sessions in QUESTION_SESSION table
        This method is called when receiving URIRequest.DELETE_SUBJECT

      • doSearch

        public java.lang.Object doSearch(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
        Description copied from interface: ISubjectService
        Select a List of Subject matching conditions of parameter request
        Specified by:
        doSearch in interface ISubjectService
        Parameters:
        parameters - contains
        • SubjectDAO.TITLE
        SubjectDAO.CREATION_DATE
        Returns:
        Subject.toJSON() array if subject list can be found
        Otherwise, returning an empty array

        Parameters:

        • UserDAO.USER_KEY
        SubjectDAO.ID
        SubjectDAO.TITLE
